attributes.action: Celebrate the birth of the NHS by making the 5th July a Bank Holiday
attributes.additional_details: I want to commemorate the NHS, the people who work in it, the people who rely on it and the people that founded it. It represents Great Britain at its best, so lets celebrate its achievements. This could be a day to inform and educate the population about how our NHS came into being.
attributes.background: Proclaim the 5th July as a Bank Holiday

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303882

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
